Mortgage Tips

How to Lower Your EMI

Extending your loan term can lower your EMI (monthly payment) but will increase your total interest. Increasing your down payment will also reduce monthly installments.

Optimal Down Payment

It's generally recommended to put down at least 20% to avoid private mortgage insurance costs and secure better interest rates.

Loan Qualification

A good credit score and stable income are key to getting favorable mortgage rates. Generally, your monthly payment should not exceed 28% of your monthly income.
